description: The Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight Materials ETF (Fund) is based on the S&P 500 Equal Weight Materials Index (Index). The Fund will invest at least 90% of its total assets in common stocks that comprise the Index. The Index equally weights stocks in the materials sector of the S&P 500 Index. The Fund and the Index are rebalanced quarterly.
name: Invesco S&P 500 Equal Weight Materials ETF
